title: VS Event: Load-screen borders [Question]
body:
Hi all,

I am a casual player of league of legends, with my ranked days behind me, but I do come on to play ARAMs and ARURF. I've just completed my missions, accumulating 150 tokens and bought the God Token to get 2 icons and my load-screen border.
Anyway, my question is this, now that I have unlocked the load-screen border, how do I equip it? I have a gold border from, last season, but I don't have the god-king Darius border equipped. I don't know if there is an over-ride where ranked>all other borders, if I get at the end of the event, or if I am just out of the loop on where to equip it. If anyone has an answer, that would be greatly appreciated.

Cheers,
Jacko

replies.body: In order to use the VS event borders you need to be using the associated skin. The same holds true for all other skin-based borders. It's also important to note that skin-based borders are separate from ranked borders, so if you have both, both will show up.
For-real? That's a shame. Have to spend money to use a border :(. If I had known that, I wouldn't have got gone for it an instead spent it on 10 key shards.
